setup.errorNoHDD:
This device is intended to work with hard disk drive installed.
Please turn off the device and install a hard disk drive.
setup.errorNoNetwork:
This device needs network connection to work.
Please connect it to the local network ot Internet

passwordRequirements.minLengthMessage: Password must be at least 8 characters long
passwordRequirements.requiredMessage: Only latin letters, numbers and keyboard symbols are allowed
passwordRequirements.weakMessage: Password should contain different types of symbols
passwordRequirements.commonMessage: This password is in list of most popular passwords

settings.confirmRestoreDefault: Clear database and settings? This process will take some time and server will be restarted afterwards.
settings.restartNeeded: Changes saved. Restart server to apply new settings?
settings.confirmRestoreSettings: Restore all server settings? Archive will be saved, but network settings will be reset.
settings.confirmRestoreSettingsNotNetwork: Reset server configuration? Archive and network settings will be saved.
settings.unsafePortConfirm: It is not safe to use port number less than 1025. Server might be not accessible. Continue anyway?
settings.confirmDisconnectFromCloudTitle:
All cloud users will be deleted.

System will be accessible through local network with local administrator account.
settings.disconnectedFromSystemSuccess: Server was detached from the System successfully
settings.confirmChangePasswordTitle: Change System password? It will affect user 'admin' and the root password for some servers
settings.nx1ControlHint: Client application has been started. Use a keyboard/mouse or mobile application to control it.

settingsConfig.cloudConnectUdpHolePunchingEnabled: Enable UDP hole punching for cloud connect
settingsConfig.maxDifferenceBetweenSynchronizedAndInter: Max difference between synchronized and Internet time (milliseconds)
settingsConfig.maxDifferenceBetweenSynchronizedAndLocal: Max difference between synchronized and local time (milliseconds)
settingsConfig.statisticsAllowed: Send anonymous usage statistics and crash reports
settingsConfig.maxWearableArchiveSynchronizationThreads: Max wearable camera archive sync threads
settingsConfig.useWindowsEmailLineFeed: Use Windows line feed in emails
settingsConfig.showHanwhaAlternativePtzControlsOnTile: Hanwha: Show alternative PTZ controls on tile
settingsConfig.maxWebMTranscoders: Max amount of WEBM connections for the server. Chrome opens 2 connections at once, then close the first one. So, it is recommended to set value >=2 to this parameter.
settingsConfig.maxEventLogRecords: Maximum event log records to keep into the database. Real amount of undeleted records may be up to 20% higher than the specified value.

join.SystemIsUnreacheble: System is unreachable or does not exist.
join.incompatibleVersion: System is unreachable, does not exist or has incompatible version.
join.wrongUrl: Unable to connect to the specified server.
join.newSystemError: Cannot merge Systems. Remote System is not configured.
join.safeMode: Cannot merge Systems. Remote System is in safe mode.
join.configError: Cannot merge Systems. Maybe one of Systems is in safe mode.
join.cloudError: Cannot merge Systems. Dependent System is connected to cloud. You need to disconnect it first.
join.cloudBothError: Cannot merge Systems. Both Systems are connected to cloud. You need to disconnect one first.
join.cloudHostConflict: Cannot merge Systems, because servers are built with different cloud hosts
join.licenceError: Warning! You are about to merge Systems with Starter licenses. Only one Starter license is allowed per System, so the second license will be deactivated. Merge anyway?
join.duplicateServersError: Cannot merge Systems, because they have at least 1 server with the same ID. Please remove this server and try again.

login.authLockout: Too many attempts. Try again in a minute.

navigaion.cannotGetUser: Server failure: cannot retrieve current user data

fileUpload.started: Update successfully started. It will take several minutes
fileUpload.upToDate: Update failed. The provided version is already installed.
fileUpload.invalidFile: Update failed. Provided file is not a valid update archive.
fileUpload.incompatibleSystem: Update failed. Provided file is targeted for another System.
fileUpload.extractionError: Update failed. Insufficient space to extract archive, check available storage.
fileUpload.installationError: Updating failed. Cannot execute installation script.

voiceCommands.live: go to live | show me live

cameraStates.noFormat: This browser does not support video playback from this camera.
cameraStates.ieWin10: Please, use Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome browsers.
cameraStates.iosVideoTooLarge: iOS does not support video larger than fullHD (2MP: 1920x1080).
cameraStates.ubuntuNX: This browser does not support video from ARM-based servers. Please, use Chromium browser instead.
cameraStates.ieNoWebm: Please, install WebM codec for Internet Explorer.
cameraStates.flashOrWebmRequired: Please install Adobe Flash orWebM codec for playing video in Internet Explorer.
cameraStates.noArmSupport: This browser or device does not support video playback from ARM-based servers.
cameraStates.flashRequired: Please install Adobe Flash for playing videos.

common.chromeCastWarning: Chromecast is resource intensive and may cause issues on your server.
